name: Reel Black Studios
description: A black-owned, creative animation studio run by husband and wife duo Dara King and Chris Fequiere. They are the team behind the short film "Burning Rubber" and other animations

name: Bwa Studios
description: A Black female-owned studio that creates and produces programming and content for all platforms. They focus on building equity in the animation industry by recruiting Black women, women of color, and nonbinary people of color
